nodes.speaker: Professor
nodes.text: Hello there! Welcome to the world of MonsterQuest. My name is Professor Oak. People call me the Monster Professor!

nodes.speaker: Professor
nodes.text: This world is inhabited by creatures called Monsters. For some people, Monsters are pets. Others use them for battles.

nodes.speaker: Professor
nodes.text: Myself... I study Monsters as a profession. First, what is your name?

nodes.speaker: Professor
nodes.text: Right! So your name is Red!

nodes.speaker: Professor
nodes.text: Ah! So your name is Ash!

nodes.speaker: Professor
nodes.text: OK! So your name is Blue!

nodes.speaker: Professor
nodes.text: Your very own Monster legend is about to unfold! A world of dreams and adventures with Monsters awaits! Let's go!

nodes.speaker: Professor
nodes.text: Here, you can choose your first Monster companion. Choose wisely, as this Monster will be your partner on your journey!

choices.text: I need more time to decide

nodes.speaker: Professor
nodes.text: Embercub, an excellent choice! This Fire-type Monster is brave and loyal. Take good care of it!

nodes.speaker: Professor
nodes.text: Bubblefin, a wonderful choice! This Water-type Monster is gentle and strong. Treat it well!

nodes.speaker: Professor
nodes.text: No rush, take your time. This is an important decision. Come back when you're ready to choose.
